name: Indoorgps
body:
### Welcome to my Project: Indoor GPS
via Estimote Beacons, Position Calculating.

But i have one Problem, the signal from Estimote Beacons are to low and crab!

Feel free and Program a IndoorGPS System with Wifi or what ever!

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Logic
You have 3 Beacons (Estimote) they have 2 Values X Coordinate and Y Coordinate (0,0) (320,0) (160,480) The Beacons gives you Distance (2,5m etc.)

With this Values, you can Calculating your Position.

### Calculating
Beacon: AP1( 5,5 )
AP2( 8,5 ) AP3( 6.5,2.5 )

r1 = 2 r2 = 2 r3 = 2

Solution: x0 = (1/delta) * (2*A*(y1-y3)-2*B*(y1-y2)) y0 = (1/delta) * (2*B*(x1-x2)-2*A*(x1-x3))

delta = 4*((x1-x2)(y1-y3)-(x1-x3)(y1-y2))

A = r2²-r1²-x2²+x1²-y2²+y1²

B = r3²-r1²-x3²+x1²-y3²+y1²

Result: x = 10 y = 5

![My image](https://github.com/N00D13/IndoorGPS/blob/master/img/trieee.gif?raw=true)


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/N00D13/IndoorGPS or contact wellnitz.alex@gmail.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
